item.title: ‘One Battle After Another’ Review: Paul Thomas Anderson’s Rallying Cry
item.description: The director, at the height of his powers, delivers a startling, present-day American epic, with Leonardo DiCaprio as a washed-up radical and doting d...

item.title: Trump Assures Arab Leaders He Won’t Allow Israel to Annex West Bank, Officials Say
item.description: After more countries recognized a Palestinian state, President Trump told Mideast and Muslim powers that he would not permit Israel to annex the terri...

item.title: What We Know About the Dallas ICE Facility Shooting and Suspect
item.description: One detainee was killed and two others were wounded after a gunman opened fire on Wednesday. The gunman died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound.

item.title: Top Economic Leaders Warn Supreme Court to Allow Lisa Cook to Remain at Fed, for Now
item.description: In a brief filed with the court, former Fed chairs and U.S. Treasury secretaries cautioned of erosion in public confidence in the Fed’s independence.

item.title: What Declines in Reading and Math Mean for the U.S. Work Force
item.description: U.S. employers and colleges are contending with more young people who are behind academically. Some are trying to make up where schools have failed.
